description: This notification is sent when a premium feature license is uninstalled from the system.
To enable the device to send this trap, cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState needs to
be set to enabled. The cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState is enabled by default.
Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName, cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus
and cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName.

event.Summary: Premium feature license ($v3) is uninstalled from the system

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseNotInstalledNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus i 1 CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The name of a premium feature.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName

description: Premium feature license operational status:
infoNotAvailable: Licensing information is not applicable or does
not apply to the platform.
notInstalled: referred to as an invalid license. This means that
none of the operationally enabled modules has a key installed
for this license.
installed: referred to as a valid license. This means that all
of the operationally enabled modules have a key installed for
this license and all conditional requirements for such license
installation have been satisfied.
partial: referred to as a partial License. This means that one
or more, but not all, operationally enabled modules have a key
installed for this license.
noBasicLic: Requires Basic or Carrier License. This means the
feature has its key installed into all operationally enabled
modules however such feature is not considered installed, or
valid, because the Basic Edition or Carrier Edition license
is not installed, or valid.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus

description: The domain name of a premium feature.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName

description: This notification is sent when there are fewer licenses available in the pool.
To enable the device to send this trap, cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState
needs to be set to enabled. The cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState is enabled
by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress
cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName, cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus
and cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicensePartialStatusNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus i 1 CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The name of a premium feature.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName

description: Premium feature license operational status:
infoNotAvailable: Licensing information is not applicable or does
not apply to the platform.
notInstalled: referred to as an invalid license. This means that
none of the operationally enabled modules has a key installed
for this license.
installed: referred to as a valid license. This means that all
of the operationally enabled modules have a key installed for
this license and all conditional requirements for such license

partial: referred to as a partial License. This means that one
or more, but not all, operationally enabled modules have a key

noBasicLic: Requires Basic or Carrier License. This means the
feature has its key installed into all operationally enabled
modules however such feature is not considered installed, or

variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus

description: The domain name of a premium feature.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName

description: This notification is sent when there was an unsuccessful installation
of a premium feature license on the slot. To enable the device to send
this trap, cienaCesFeatureLicenseInstallErrorTrapState needs to be set
to enabled. The cienaCesFeatureLicenseInstallErrorTrapState is enabled
by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress,cienaCesModuleChassisIndx, cienaCesModuleShelfIndx
cienaCesModuleSlotIndx, and cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstallUnsuccessfulReason.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Premium feature license installation successful' : 'Premium feature license installation unsuccessful due to $v6'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstallErrorNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleChassisIndx u 1 CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleShelfIndx u 0 CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleSlotIndx u 1 CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstallUnsuccessfulReason s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object indicates the chassis index for the module.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleChassisIndx

description: This object indicates the shelf index for the module.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleShelfIndx

description: This object indicates the slot index for the module.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleSlotIndx

description: This object represents the status of an install operation.
This object is included in the cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstallErrorNotification
upon an unsuccessful installation.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstallUnsuccessfulReason

description: This notification is sent when a premium feature license is installed on the system.
To enable the device to send this trap, cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState needs to
be set to enabled. The cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState is enabled by default.
Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName, cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus
and cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName.

event.Summary: Premium feature license ($v3) is installed on the system

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseInstalledNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus i 1 CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName s EXAMPLE

description: This notification is sent whenever there is license usage violation.
To enable the device to send this trap, cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState
needs to be set to enabled. The cienaCesFeatureLicenseStatusTrapState is enabled
by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress
cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName, cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus
and cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Premium feature license ($v3) usage violation notification cleared' : 'Premium feature license ($v3) usage violation notification occurred'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseUsageViolationNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseOperStatus i 1 CIENA-CES-FEATURE-LICENSE-MIB::cienaCesPremiumFeatureLicenseDomainName s EXAMPLE
